alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:52PM EDT until June 04 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Telos Lake, or 15 miles north of Ripogenus, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Telos Lake around 510 PM EDT. Baxter State Park around 530 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
